message:
Quick Start
Run your local blockchain:
> ganache-cli --secure -u 0 -u 1 -u 2 --deterministic
Initialize the Provable Open Zeppelin starter-kit:
> openzeppelin init provable-starter-kit
Go to the client directory:
> cd client
Run the app:
> npm run start
Continue in your browser!
More at https://provable.xyz & https://openzeppelin.com/

hooks.post-unpack: echo 'âœ” Your Provable Starter Kit is unpacked & ready to go!'
